jump_scares.spoiler: There is a slight jump scare as we get a sudden flashback to Arlette’s decomposing corpse in the well
A rat scuttles out from underneath a box
An ambulance crashes into a car in front of Malorie and Jess
After Malorie shoots her gun several times, the stranger suddenly grabs her and yells “take your damn blindfold off”
After repeating Malorie’s name several times, the girl is pulled to the ground and dragged away
A loud gunshot may startle very sensitive viewers
Sue reaches down to put flowers on Carrie’s grave however a bloodied hand reaches out of the ground and grabs her. [Video]
Cujo jumps up at the car window
Cujo jumps onto the hood of the car
Cujo runs at the cop exploring the building
Cujo breaks through the window behind Donna
A stranger rushes at Alex with a knife
A dark figure rushes toward the screen behind Alex’s nana
Adam startles himself awake chasing Lucy in a library dream sequence
Henry notices Adam’s fingers moving as he and Liz dump the bodies
Pollidori backs away from Liz’s body and us startled by his wife in the hall
Adam punches through Pollidori’s car window
A phone rings during a tense scene
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers
A man is hit by a car
An apparently dead woman suddenly reaches out and grabs Pete
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid that Beaver is sitting on
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid that Beaver is sitting on
Jonesy suddenly returns to the room, startling Beaver
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid
Loud bang on the underside of the toilet lid
There is a loud bang on the door (followed by several more over the next 20 seconds)
A red dust erupts from the aliens head
Henry has a sharp and sudden vision of Jonesy’s possession
A truck drives into a shed, nearly running over Henry
A blow up doll suddenly appears behind Heather as part of a joke to startle her
A silhouette runs past the screen in the background
Heather turns around and the killer is standing right in front of her
Heather turns around and a skeleton mask on the wall startles her
One of Deena’s friends jumps out from behind a toilet stall to scare her as a joke
The curtain falls down to reveal the killer standing behind it
A police car drives out from behind the corner, startling Simon
A silhouette runs across the screen
Josh shines the flashlight on a killer running straight at him
A silhouette once again runs by in the background
Kate is suddenly grabbed from above while hiding
Deena runs into Josh while walking out of the kitchen
Eriko suddenly springs up from her sleep and gasps
The train suddenly shakes, startling the group
Kato suddenly pulls the trigger, shooting Eriko
A sword suddenly flies out of the fog and stabs Kato
A car suddenly explodes
Gantz suddenly closes its compartments with a loud mechanical noise
Several compartments suddenly come out of the sphere with a loud mechanical noise
The alien child suddenly spits a strange goo over the group
The child suddenly implodes, splattering black goo all over the room
Kishimoto suddenly tackles the alien from the side
Several compartments once again suddenly come out of Gantz
The presumably dead alien jumps back up behind Kato
The alien loudly implodes
The large statue implodes, sending rocks flying everywhere
The statue suddenly begins to move, attacking Kurono with its swords
As the statue’s reflection slowly becomes visible, it attacks, shattering the glass
The statue suddenly begins to attack at extreme speed
There is a slight scare when a walkie talkie makes a loud noise as Georgie descends the stairs to the basement
There is another minor scare as we see Pennywise’s eyes appear at the drain grill in front of Georgie
There is a loud bang on a door as Mike takes out some rubbish
After a rather intense scene, Mike is almost run over by Henry’s car
The distorted woman from the painting appears in front of Stan
In the library basement, Ben is running away from a headless man when Pennywise suddenly appears in front of him and shouts “Egg Boy”
Ben is jumped by Patrick as he leaves the library (this is a very minor jump scare)
Patrick enters the sewerage system and uses an aerosol can and lighter flamethrower style as he hunts for Ben, suddenly he sees various dead children standing in front of him
Patrick sees a balloon in front of him and it pops to reveal Pennywise standing there
The hair from the drain suddenly winds itself around Beverly’s wrist
In the kitchen, Georgie rushes past the screen in the foreground as Bill looks on
Bill sees Georgie in the flooded basement, he slowly begins to decay and suddenly Pennywise rushes through the water towards Bill

The children are in Bill’s garage looking at various slides on a projector screen that suddenly begins to take on a life of its own. Pennywise appears on the projector screen and the kids panic and attempt to turn the projector off. Suddenly Pennywise is coming out of the projector and into the room with them
In the Neibolt street house  Richie, Bill, and Eddie see Betty begging for help at a doorway when she is suddenly pulled off screen
After Richie finds himself locked in the room full of clowns, Richie turns around and a clown doll is standing right behind him and he gets a scare

In a room full of clowns, Richie walks towards a coffin and opens it. The scene is quite suspenseful and we expect a jump scare upon the coffin being opened however the scare doesn’t occur until after Richie closes the lid and Pennywise jumps up from behind
Bill and Richie go through a door marked “not scary” and after a couple of seconds the light is turned on and we see Betty Ripson hanging by ropes
In perhaps the only truly unexpected jump scare, Beverly turns around to leave the bathroom after a confrontation with her father and is attacked by Pennywise who is standing behind her
Beverly notices a music box playing, the music stops and a second later we get a slight jump scare as a toy clown pops out of the box
Stan hears someone whispering his name, he shines the torch down the tunnel and sees Pennywise briefly appear at the opening
Stan looks around with a torch and there is a scare when the distorted woman from the painting rushes at Stan
Eddie slips into the water in a sewer tunnel and sees several floating corpses
There is a slight scare when Georgie’s motionless body suddenly starts to shake

movies.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer

jump_scares.spoiler: The presumed dead man suddenly grabs Helen
The drowning man suddenly opens his eyes, startling Barry
Missy appears behind Julie and Helen
Helen turns around and is startled by a hanging coat
Missy bangs on the car window
Elsa puts her hand on Helen’s shoulder
Julie opens the car boot and sees Max’s corpse covered in crabs
Missy approaches Julie with a knife
The killer jumps out from underneath a plastic sheet and attacks Helen. [Video]
The killer suddenly appears behind Helen
A corpse slides down in front of Julie
Julie puts her hand on the face of another corpse
A dark figure crashes through the door. [Video]
Becky calls out to Cal. She turns around and a woman suddenly emerges out of the grass (this is accompanied by a loud sound effect)
After hearing a noise, Travis crawls towards the tall grass to investigate. He then turns around and Tobin is right behind him
As Cal follows Becky, Ross suddenly puts his hand on Cal’s shoulder
Cal looks across and sees his own corpse lying beside him (this is accompanied by a sound effect)
As the young woman and Jake begin to kiss, there is suddenly a cut to an old man watching them with loud echoing noises
Beverly walks into her husband as she packs her belongings
We see dead bodies littering the Derry sewer runoff when suddenly Henry Bowers face appears out of the water
Henry tries to dislodge the balloon under his bed but it pops to reveal the corpse of Patrick Hockstetter behind it
A sudden cut to a gong (as Richie is hugging Bev) being hit may startle some viewers
During an encounter with Pennywise under the bleachers, a girl says “you’re supposed to say 3” and is immediately devoured by Pennywise
A naked monstrous woman runs out at Beverly
The giant statue suddenly appears right beside Richie as he sits on the park bench
Richie closes his eyes and says “it isn’t real”, when he opens them Pennywise suddenly runs at him
A corpse-like hand suddenly grabs Bill when he reaches down to grab Georgie
During the classroom scene, as Beverley says “no matter how many stupid poems you write”, Ben turns around and Beverley’s head is now on fire
Pennywise is suddenly behind Ben in the locker
In present day, Eddie pulls the curtain back but nothing is behind there, he turns around and is suddenly attacked by the rotting corpse
Eddie is washing his face. He adjusts the mirror to reveal Henry Bowers standing behind him
Bill collides with one of the inflatable clowns as he tries to follow the boy into the house of mirrors
As Mike lowers the book he is reading, he is suddenly attacked by Henry Bowers
The Stanley-spider suddenly runs at Richie
As Beverly says “I thought I heard something” a corpse pops up out of the water in front of her
The loud pop as a giant balloon bursts may startle some viewers
Beverly turns her torch on, then immediately shines it on Pennywise
After Eddie says “That’s a good boy”, the Pomeranian dog suddenly transforms into a monster
Georgie turns his head to reveal a corpse-like face
Mike runs into Pennywise
Eddie is impaled by one of Pennywises’s claws after he says “I think I killed him for real”
A now shriveled up Pennywise roars and lunges at Mike as he reaches out to touch him
Maisie jumps out at her nanny (as a joke)
Some small raptors run out of the abandoned car as Owen approaches it, a few seconds later a larger raptor jumps on the car
The Indoraptor suddenly clamps on to Wheatley’s arm
The Indoraptor suddenly tackles one of the armed guards as Eli talks to Claire and Owen
Accompanied by a sound effect, we see the dead guard suddenly pulled out of sight
The fighting Raptors break the window in front of Owen and Maisie as they scale the side of the house
A T-Rex suddenly ambushes Eli as he bends down to pick up the DNA sample
A pig suddenly runs past the screen
After apparently leaving, the Indominus rex suddenly crashes through the garage where Claire and Owen are hiding
A man places his bloodied hand on the back window, startling Claire
A Velociraptor breaks through the window while Claire is driving
A Velociraptor appears beside Hoskins
Eli attacks a man under the bridge
Eli jumps on Lacke and attacks him
Odd turns around and a faceless man in a bowling shirt is in front of him. [Video]
A man gets hit by a truck suddenly
A cold force suddenly radiates out from the door
Odd’s hand is suddenly pulled into a hole in the door
A large number of bodachs suddenly appear in the room
Something bangs on the door that Stormy is standing behind
A bodach pops up in front of the camera
Odd closes the fridge door to reveal the ghost of Bob standing behind. [Video]
A masked man appears at a window
As Varner prepares to shoot Odd in the van, a bodach suddenly comes out of the window and screeches at Odd
A truck drives by startling Rachel after she says “everything is inside”
The injured man grabs Louis around the arm as he wheels him into theater
The lights flicker and the previously dead man is suddenly sitting up on the bed behind Louis
Louis sits in his car lost in thought  as he goes to drive off a truck suddenly races past in front of him
Victor’s hand suddenly reaches out to grab Louis around the ankle as he climbs the pile of branches
During a flashback, young Rachel is startled as her disfigured sister suddenly falls down the dumbwaiter shaft
Louis opens the closet revealing Church who screeches at him
Ellie is suddenly scratched by the cat as she tries to remove something from its fur
Church screeches at Louis from behind
After Louis walks through a door and finds himself back outside in the woods, a truck horn suddenly blares
Rachel has a hallucination where the medicine cabinet in the bathroom transforms into the dumbwaiter shaft which her sister once again falls through
After Louis finds the mask, Ellie appears behind him and says “Daddy”
Jud spots Church in the hallway and suddenly Ellie stabs him in the ankle
After waking from a nightmare Rachel looks up to find Gage safe. Suddenly Ellie leaps at her with a knife
Hannibal’s sudden reappearance and subsequent attack on Will may startle some viewers
An image of some dolls briefly flashes on the screen accompanied by a high pitched whooshing noise
Hannibal lunges towards Will (but is stopped by the chain holding him)
A hand comes out of the van to grab Freddy
The Tooth Fairy suddenly puts his hands over Freddy’s face. [Video]
A man looks up and sees Hannibal standing right in front of him
The girl bangs her hand on the glass door
Asakawa suddenly jumps up from the table in anger

movies.title: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark

jump_scares.spoiler: Chuckie grabs Auggie from behind (as a joke)
As Chuckie hides from the woman in the bedroom, the door suddenly opens (but it is only Auggie behind it)
A door slams
As Tommy turns around, he comes face to face with the scarecrow
Auggie is suddenly pulled under the bed
The police chief is suddenly thrown against the cell
As Ramon drives away, The Jangly man suddenly lands on the windscreen
A man suddenly looks under the bed where Stella is hiding
Mort removes a sheet to reveal his dead dog
Mort taps on the glass of a car and the man inside moves suddenly
A figure moves in the reflection of the window
There is a loud noise behind Mort as he goes to open a door
The medicine cabinet falls down
Shooter begins talking from behind Mort
A bus roars past behind where Mort and Ted are arguing
There is an abrupt flashback to Ted yelling at Mort
Mort sees a dead body which is accompanied by some loud noises
The dead body in the back seat slumps over
Loud rattling noises coming from the ceiling can be heard periodically over the next 30-40 seconds
More rattling noises come from the ceiling
Karl startles Chris while she is in the attic
Regan sees a demon appear for a brief moment
The scene abruptly cuts to Regan screaming
Regan spider-walks down the stairs with blood coming from her mouth
The possessed Regan vomits green liquid over Father Karras
The phone rings loudly
There is a loud moan from the upstairs bedroom
Regan sits up in bed and attacks Father Karras from behind
The house begins to shake violently
The doors to the church are blown open by a sudden gust of wind
A window is broken an a man falls out of a house
The sliding screen to the confession booth is opened quickly, startling Lieutenant Kinderman
Alice runs into Kinderman as he turns around
Damien makes a horrible roaring noise
There is a loud clattering noise as Nurse Amy is about to enter a room
A man sits up in his bed and yells at Amy. [Video]
A shrouded figure comes out of the room just behind Amy holding a large pair of scissors. [Video]
Damien yells NO! at Kinderman
Kinderman bursts into a darkened room where a nurse is seeing a patient
The priests ritual book explodes while he is performing an exorcism
The banging on the wall resumes, much louder and faster than before. It continues on and off over the next few minutes
A door slams shut
Grace’s face suddenly appears from a trapdoor in the rafters causing Eleanor to scream. [Video]
After the ectoplasm envelops the jar, it disappears in a crack, startling Mrs. Barrett and Ms. Tanner
Dr. Barrett’s teacup shatters in his hand
Mr. Fischer jerks up and starts to scream directly at the camera
Ms. Tanner comes across the black cat’s mangled body in the shower, accompanied with a loud sound effect
Belasco’s spirit roars and lights up the stained glass window behind the crucifix, startling Ms. Tanner
The crucifix falls on Ms. Tanner, critically injuring her
Mr. Barrett’s equipment suddenly blows up in his face, injuring him
The stained glass window shatters after a long closeup on Mr. Fischer’s face
There is a loud bang after someone says “Jonas, there’s something outside the ship”
There is a loud noise as the sub is hit
As Suyin starts counting down something slams into the glider
A tentacle suddenly lands on the glider startling Suyin
The Megalodon bites into the glass startling Meiying
A whale bangs into the window in front of Mac
The Megalodon suddenly attacks the whale
Jonas submerges once more and the shark is now swimming directly in front of him
A shark bumps into the tank that Suyin is in
The Megalodon rams the tank
The Megalodon rams the tank once more
As The Wall leans in to the shark carcass for a picture, the carcass suddenly moves and he falls overboard
The Megalodon jumps out of the water and swallows The Wall
Morris leans out of the boat to look at the carcass and is startled when a man jumps down beside him
Morris briefly rests on the carcass of the dead whale before the Megalodon appears and eats him
The shark lunges out of the water and attacks the group of beach swimmers
The Megalodon suddenly appears in front of Jonas
A loud splash startles DJ and Meiying
Sun-ju opens the closet door and there is a quick flash of an image of Sang-Mi’s corpse
Sun-ju looks up from the well and there is a loud flashback to the scene of the old woman from the tape
The TV suddenly turns on
There are several quick cuts to the twins lying in the hallway covered in blood
Jack jumps out and attacks Hallorann with an axe
The camera quickly pans to show a bloodied man standing in the hallway behind Wendy
A rocking chair unexpectedly moves as a child screams
There is a sudden vibrating sound
A figure unexpectedly appears, followed by a perfectly timed scream
After a somewhat intense scene, Catherine turns around quickly and bumps into her husband
A clown lamp explodes
A door slams shut
Something large suddenly crashes through the bedroom window
